Class Weapon

java.lang.Object
items.Item
items.Weapon
All Implemented Interfaces:
Purchasable
Direct Known Subclasses:
Axe, CombatKnife, Hammer, KnuckleDusters, Machete, Revolver, Rifle, ShotGun, WoodenStick
public class Weapon extends Item implements Purchasable
Represents a weapon item that increases attack power and critical stats.

    • Weapon

      public Weapon(String name, int attackBonus, double critChanceBonus, double critDamageBonus, int costHearts, int costBrains, WeaponType type)
      Constructs a new Weapon object.
      Parameters:
      name - Name of the weapon
      attackBonus - Attack power to add
      critChanceBonus - Critical chance to add
      critDamageBonus - Critical damage multiplier to add
      costHearts - Cost in hearts
      costBrains - Cost in brains
      type - Type of the weapon
